timeline.bodyText:
I didn't understand the trick of nester withEnv steps, but I just tested and it seems there is no other way.
Regarding the PATH variable, can we skip ORIG_PATH and use "JAVA_HOME+PATH=${env.JAVA_HOME}/bin"? See with-env for a better explanation of what I mean :)
timeline.author: v1v

replies.bodyText: Here I'd still prefer to use ORIG_PATH because I want to ensure that we have a clean path without Java explicitly defined anywhere on it. If we prepend to the current path as you suggest, we'll be prepending to what we previously set in L77.
replies.author: cachedout
